attributes.action: Reform Libel law, (Super-)Injunctions and The Royal Charter
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition to reform Libel Law and the use of injunctions/super-injunctions. I mainly wish for the Royal Charter to be changed as it gives politicians the power to censor the Press, which goes against the ideals of democracy in the UK and could potentially be a danger to the free Press and the right of freedom of speech and opinion.
